Welcome to multipca's documentation!
=====================================

``multipca`` is a Python package for Multi-way Principal Component Analysis with confidence intervals.

For installation instructions and quick start guide, please see the `README <https://github.com/j-bagel/multipca>`_.

For detailed examples and tutorials, check out the Jupyter notebook in the ``examples/`` directory.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   api
